It offers two modes, fence and protection zone. In the fence mode, you create a virtual fence that he cannot cross, otherwise he can move freely in the defined area. The buffer zone is created for the purpose of vegetable beds, gardens and entrance gates. The pet is not allowed in these areas. The Num'axes Canifugue FUG1034 Wireless Fence will first alert you with a vibration or sound signal that your dog is approaching a restricted area. Only after disobedience does it give an impulse. Thanks to its portable design, it can be used anywhere, with an adjustable distance of 2 to 120 metres. It has adjustable pulse strength and can also be switched off completely. It can be powered from the mains, a full charge takes about an hour.
